testcase.name: wiggum.js hook file exists and is readable
wiggum.js has proper shebang
run-hook-test.sh harness exists and is executable
parse-hook-events.js parser exists
wiggum hook output identifies as Stop event hook
wiggum hook does nothing when WIGGUM_ACTIVE is not set
wiggum hook does nothing when WIGGUM_ACTIVE=0
wiggum hook activates when WIGGUM_ACTIVE=1
wiggum hook output is valid JSON
wiggum hook output contains hookSpecificOutput with hookEventName
wiggum hook output contains continue field
wiggum hook includes reason when blocking exit
wiggum hook blocks exit when tasks are pending
wiggum hook blocks exit when tasks are in_progress
wiggum hook re-injection prompt contains task status
wiggum hook allows exit when all tasks have status success
wiggum hook allows exit when all tasks have status complete
wiggum hook allows exit when completion promise tag detected
wiggum hook allows exit when max iterations reached
wiggum hook increments iteration count
wiggum hook default max iterations is 50
wiggum hook caps max iterations at 1000
wiggum hook sets stop_hook_active when blocking
wiggum hook allows exit and clears flag when stop_hook_active is true
wiggum hook finds project root with .trd-state directory
wiggum hook allows exit when no .trd-state directory exists
wiggum hook handles empty input gracefully
wiggum hook handles malformed JSON input gracefully
wiggum hook handles missing cwd gracefully
wiggum hook handles invalid implement.json gracefully
wiggum hook outputs debug info to stderr when WIGGUM_DEBUG=1
wiggum hook does not output debug info when WIGGUM_DEBUG=0
wiggum hook output can be parsed by parse-hook-events.js
wiggum hook handles mixed success/pending/in_progress statuses
wiggum hook handles empty tasks object
wiggum hook handles failed/blocked task statuses as incomplete
